dicom_process module¶

dicom_process.extract_pixel_spacing(dicom_file)[source]¶

tries to access ImagerPixelSpacing attribute of the dicom_file: if this is not present, then runs find_element_spacing to try to access the element corresponding the pixel imager spacing

Parameters

dicom_file (pydicom.dataset.FileDataset) -- a dicom file output of pydicom.readfile

Returns

the imager spacing data if this is found, Nonetype otherwise, spacing is a list/tuple (xspacing, yspacing)

Return type

list

dicom_process.find_spacing_element(dicom_file, _print=False)[source]¶

Iterates through the elements in dicom_file to find the element corresponding to the pixel spacing element

Parameters

dicom_file (pydicom.dataset.FileDataset) -- a dicom file output of pydicom.readfile

Returns

a data element if pixel spacing data is found, none otherwise

Return type

data element
